skip.description: Tests to skip as comma delimited values.
skip.help_text: Tests to skip as comma delimited values. E.g. --skip TEST_SUCCESS,TEST_INPUT. Case insensitive.

remoteFile.description: Path to remote file to download and use.
remoteFile.help_text: Path to a remote file to use within the pipeline. This mimics a remote set of files such as reference data that may need to be retrieved prior to analysis. The default is a small file on igenomes, which is stored on S3 and is publicly accessible. This can be replaced by a different file more appropriate for your set up if you do not wish to access resources like this.
